title: StackGambler
author: StackGambler
content: Hello guys,I have for sale an unforgettable piece of gambling history that all gambling lovers would treasure in their collection of antiques.First account: KLITZThe legend, at the top of the all time bustabit leaderboard: https://www.bustabit.com/leaderboard/Also on the home page: https://www.bustabit.com/With an astounding profit of +468.86 BTC https://www.bustabit.com/user/klitzBuy it now price: 0.499 BTCSecond account: FREE-JBAY5Another legend, but flipped around..https://www.bustabit.com/user/FREE-JBAY5All time high profit of 706 BTC, current profit of -492 BTC.Number 1 on bustabit for profit all-time high, number 4 for all-time losses, number 2 for wagered.Buy it now price: 0.299 BTCPeople have asked to buy these accounts for many purposes: tax write offs, proving their source of income from gambling for tax purposes, flexing ownership of large accounts on people... But in my view, the real value behind these is getting to own a piece of Bustabit history that you can cherish forever as an antique in your collection, if you're a true fan of the Bitcoin gambling space. Open to offers in private messages or via email (stackgod123@gmail.com). Thanks for reading!
